prompt: A rare full art image depicting the Radiant Empress of the Nebula. She stands gracefully on an ethereal platform made of shimmering stardust, her regal robes flowing like liquid light. Her crown is adorned with tiny, glowing stars, and her eyes shimmer with the wisdom of the cosmos. In the background, a vibrant nebula swirls with colors of violet, turquoise, and gold, and ancient starships can be seen navigating the celestial currents. The whole scene is bathed in a soft, ethereal glow, capturing the majesty and mystique of the Stellar Monarch.
